underlying_goal: The user wanted to improve the paper's framing by better explaining the choice of baselines (lie detectors, trusted monitors), especially since they aren't standard in the literature.
primary_success: Successfully reframed the paper's baseline section to justify the non-standard choice of 'lie detectors' and contextualize it against concurrent work from UK AISI, a nuanced and critical framing task.
brief_summary: The user wanted to better contextualize the baselines used in a research paper. Claude identified the weak framing, drafted new text explaining why lie detectors and trusted monitors were chosen, updated the introduction, and added a note clarifying the relationship to concurrent work from UK AISI. The agent iteratively refined the text based on user feedback.
